channel.title: Where do i change the logout text?
channel.description: ok so i just found out you can portforward without a router on utorrent and portforwarded and now I can log into my server. But when you click on the Door icon for the log out button above the Log Out thing it still says the previous server name. Can someone help? [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/logoutprob1.jpg[/img] and I want to change Reapage Scape to Flamed Fury

item.title: Where do i change the logout text?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Dude I don’t even work with RSPS anymore. Don’t grave dig!

Read full topic
item.source: Where do i change the logout text?

item.title: Where do i change the logout text?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“JohnLesbergtion, post:13, topic:268076”]You are all noobs. Most servers don’t f*in include it in client or texthandler. This is because the makers are such noobs that they don’t know how to change it themselves. What you need to do is go into your TextHandler.java then use this code to change the text:

sendQuest("@gre@Text 1?", 2450);
sendQuest("@red@Text 2", 2451);
sendQuest("@cya@Text 3", 2452);
sendQuest(“Logout!”, 2458);

That should work.

Next time don’t listen to the noobs who think ctrl + F will find your answer. Some people don’t include it and may leave it with the default RuneScape text. ":_[/quote]
Don’t grave dig with spam pls.

Read full topic
item.source: Where do i change the logout text?

item.title: Where do i change the logout text?
item.dc:creator: @JohnLesbergtion JohnLesbergtion
item.description:
@JohnLesbergtion wrote:

You are all noobs. Most servers don’t f*in include it in client or texthandler. This is because the makers are such noobs that they don’t know how to change it themselves. What you need to do is go into your TextHandler.java then use this code to change the text:

sendQuest("@gre@Text 1?", 2450);
sendQuest("@red@Text 2", 2451);
sendQuest("@cya@Text 3", 2452);
sendQuest(“Logout!”, 2458);

That should work.

Next time don’t listen to the noobs who think ctrl + F will find your answer. Some people don’t include it and may leave it with the default RuneScape text. ":_

item.title: Where do i change the logout text?

item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:2, topic:268076”]textHandler

Next time, search for it by typing in what you want to find in the “Find” box by pressing Ctrl+Alt+F[/quote]
It’s just Ctrl+F.

Read full topic

item.title: Where do i change the logout text?
item.dc:creator: @i_nelson_i i nelson i
item.description:
@i_nelson_i wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:7, topic:268076”]If nothing came up after doing what i said, then you’re doing it wrong.

[quote author=i nelson i link=topic=353846.msg2711318#msg2711318 date=1237324721]
open text handler and search logout

if not there try clicking buttons and client.java
[/quote]clickingmost isn’t going to hold any strings. It’s used for action buttons, via a switch statement; it’s not going to be under there.[/quote]

the reaper it actually does, it has the teles names etc in there, so i was just saying as an option, as logout button,

Read full topic
